reviewText: I bought this movie specifically because Roy Rogers was supposed to have a cameo role in it. I was not able to spot Roy Rogers - however it is an enjoyable western and Kenny Rogers fans will surely enjoy it.
Enjoyed this show when it was on TV and thought I'd enjoy to watch it again.  Will pass it on to family after I have watched it.

I enjoyed this and other The Gambler movies, and I love them all.
I am looking however, for the next part to this one.
This one, is easy to find in a 3 dvd collection, ends with Kate about to be hung.
and the movie ending with...  "to be continued ... "
cliff hanger for sure !

the same goes for : The Gambler: The Legend Continues.

Where to find the Continuation dvd... I have not been able to find either one yet.

If anyone knows, please tell me @
blindsetter4u at the Y
The Gambler: The Adventure Continues As good as the first movie in the series by Kenny Rogers!!
This is a good show with good action and fun.  As a young cowboy, Johnny Crawford really does a great job handling the action scenes and portraying the young cowboy!
